summary: Provides an experimental diffusion pipeline that integrates reinforcement learning value functions to guide the sampling process of generative models, allowing the generation to be steered toward higher‑reward outcomes.
business_intent: Empowers developers and product teams to produce more controlled and higher‑quality AI‑generated content by leveraging RL‑based value guidance, supporting use cases such as targeted image synthesis, brand‑consistent media creation, and content moderation.
